thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ipsos To Invest In Big Sofa Technologies Group PLC​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ipsos To Invest In Big Sofa Technologies Group PLC​
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - IPSOS SA:
* ‍INVESTMENT BY IPSOS S.A. IN BIG SOFA TECHNOLOGIES GROUP PLC​
* ‍ TO INVEST APPROX. £3 MILLION IN BIG SOFA TECHNOLOGIES PLC BY WAY OF A SUBSCRIPTION FOR ORDINARY SHARES OF ENLARGED ISSUED ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL OF BIG SOFA​
* ‍LAURENCE STOCLET, DEPUTY CEO, GROUP CFO AND SUPPORT FUNCTIONS DIRECTOR AT IPSOS, WILL BE APPOINTED TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF BIG SOFA AS A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​
* ‍INVESTMENT WILL ENABLE BIG SOFA TO ENHANCE ITS SALES AND MARKETING FUNCTIONS​
* ‍IPSOS WILL SUBSCRIBE FOR 16,402,143 ORDINARY SHARES AT A PRICE OF 18.5 PENCE PER ORDINARY SHARE FOR 20 PER CENT OF ENLARGED ISSUED ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL OF BIG SOFA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
